'''''Fishy Motive''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to buy a fishing rod from the [[Fishing Association]].

==Trivia==
* The Japanese name of the achievement may be a reference to the survival horror multiplayer game "{{w|Dead by Daylight}}."
